# MusicBrainz Scripts

A collection of user scripts for [MusicBrainz](https://musicbrainz.org).

## Installation

To install a user script from this repository, you'll need a userscript manager like [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) or [Violentmonkey](https://violentmonkey.github.io/).

## Scripts

### Wikipedia to Wikidata Converter

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/main/wikipedia-to-wikidata.user.js)

This script converts Wikipedia links to their equivalent Wikidata entities in MusicBrainz.

### HarmonyDirectAddCover

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/main/HarmonyDirectAddCover.user.js)

This script directly adds cover art from Harmony Music to MusicBrainz.

These scripts were developed with assistance from AI tools.
